header.title: os_mon_mib

description.p: This module provides functions for loading and unloading OTP-OS-MON-MIB into/from an SNMP agent. The instrumentation of OTP-OS-MON-MIB uses the Mnesia application, hence Mnesia must be started before loading OTP-OS-MON-MIB.
